plot: When Marius, Cosette, and Epipen are invited to a party at the house of Jean Valjean, there is only one caveat: all dishes must be absent of all possible food allergens.
title: One Grain More
plot_es: When Marius, Cosette, and Epipen are invited to a party at the house of Jean Valjean, there is only one caveat: all dishes must be absent of all possible food allergens.
